To standardize complex zoning ordinances, not only across Virginia but the entire nation, requires a simplification of regulations. The methodology developed by National Zoning Atlas team requires a specific reading of zoning ordinances that may not coincide with your or even a locality's interpretation of their zoning ordinance.

## 1-Family Treatment

Based on the methodology, "1-family housing means a building, including a mobile home or a manufactured home, with only one dwelling unit. 1-family zoning permits one such building on each lot."
